feed.text: Made a javascript client for Rotonde. Working on making it as functional as possible, have a few things to iron out. I plan on implementing 'comments' / 'replies' once that's done. Repo up.
Spent yesterday messing about in lubuntu. Lots of non-functional, but aesthetic tweaks were made. Who would've known terminals could look this good in pastel?
Made (primarily front-end) modifications to electricgecko's PHP client for Rotonde.
